SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[UsergroupsGrids] ( [UsergroupsGrids_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [UtentiGruppi_Ky] int NULL , [CoreGrids_Ky] int NULL , [UsergroupsGrids_UserInsert] int NULL , [UsergroupsGrids_UserUpdate] int NULL , [UsergroupsGrids_UserDelete] int NULL , [UsergroupsGrids_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [UsergroupsGrids_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [UsergroupsGrids_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsergroupsGrids] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_UsergroupsGrids PRIMARY KEY ([UsergroupsGrids_Ky])
